column2: The place of use under this application and license was sold by the original permittee, together with additional land holdings, to the applicant of the Water Rights Application 23475 (pending).  The present permittee desires to maintain this application and license until permits are issued under pending applications 23475 or 24257 (an application to consolidate all of the permitteeÂ¿s holdings).  The point of diversion under this application has been abandoned due to drought and water quality problems.  Water used under this application has been purchased from Tahoe City Public Utility District, which has a variety of groundwater sources.  The permittee intends to reestablish a point of diversion at the point identified under pending applications 23475 and 24257.  This action and resolution of Lake Tahoe Basin Water Rights will resolve the non-compliance issues of this application.  Resolution of water rights allocations is still pending subsequent to resolution of the legal challenges and implementation period of the Truckee River Operating Agreement.  Water use as intended under this application and license continues to be beneficially used.

column4: Place of use has changed to provide irrigation and domestic use at the the State park and ranger facilities at Silverwood Lake.

column2: The place of use under this application and license was sold by the original permittee, together with additional land holdings, to the applicant of the Water Rights Application 23475 (pending). The present permittee desires to maintain this application and license until permits are issued under pending applications 23475 or 24257 (an application to consolidate all of the permittee?s holdings). The point of diversion under this application has been abandoned due to drought and water quality problems. Water used under this application has been purchased from Tahoe City Public Utility District, which has a variety of groundwater sources. The permittee intends to reestablish a point of diversion at the point identified under pending applications 23475 and 24257. This action and resolution of Lake Tahoe Basin Water Rights will resolve the non-compliance issues of this application. Resolution of water rights allocations is still pending subsequent to resolution of any possible legal challenges and implementation period of the Truckee River Operating Agreement. Water use as intended under this application and license continues to be beneficially used.
